title: Power creep/mobility creep,needs to stop.
body: Simply nerfing point and click cc and then removing viability from champions with point and click or "reworking"(making it a skillshot)needs to stop if you continue making mobility champions with easy to dodge kits.

replies.body:
*Looks at Ashe, then Bard, then Sion

*Sees that many other really recent champions aren't really overloaded in terms of mobility

*Only two real rule breakers are Yasuo and Kalista

Ehh.

Totally agree.  There are certain champs, particularly of the assassin class, that make point and click cc kind of a necessity.  The move towards everything being a skillshot makes those champs stronger while also making the game less interesting due to a lack of variety.
This isn't even the problem with mobility creep.  They will just need to nerf the mobility champions once they get rid of more of the point and click cc.

The thing is, I think Riot wants point click guarantee ults to exist {{champion:84}} {{champion:131}} {{champion:254}} {{champion:111}}. But having to pick specific champions to counter mobility isn't fair.

There should be a hard CC summoner spell or item in the game, but with Riot's half assed design I wouldn't expect anything like that to come soon. :\
